pets.name: Malfoy
pets.description: Like looking into the eyes of you know who... must find attentive owner

pets.name: Goyle
pets.description: This snake is a bit slow and daft. It won't run away or bite you, but don't expect to teach it any tricks

pets.name: Hermoine
pets.description: The most clever cat around. Surprisingly loyal, cute cuddly but not so easily amused

pets.name: Cluck
pets.description: Great alarm clock if you're an early bird. Not a morning person? you may want to reconsider...

pets.name: Bruce
pets.description: Only a year old but larger than a horse. You can't miss em. Looks like a reindeer but bigger. Cold weather only

pets.name: Roosvelt
pets.description: Snuggly companion doesn't quite age like your typical pet.

pets.name: Trevor
pets.description: Often disappearing but healthy as a bull-frog. This little amphibian will out live most

pets.name: Larry
pets.description: Not for everyone... have a pool?

pets.name: Goldie Locks
pets.description: This neighborhood bear was found wandering around Yosemite
